item.title: US economy added 911,000 fewer jobs than previously reported
item.description: The downward revision appears to be the largest ever recorded.

item.title: Israel conducts 'precise strike' on Hamas leadership in Qatar: Officials
item.description: The strike took place in Doha, according to the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, which condemned the attack.

item.title: WATCH: Selena Gomez sends a message to Steve Martin and Martin Short
item.description: The star sent asked her "Only Murders in the Building" castmates a question on "GMA."

item.title: WATCH: Billy Crudup brings 'The Morning Show' to 'GMA'
item.description: The actor tells "GMA" that he sees similarities to his on-screen TV news role.

item.title: WATCH: GOP-led House Oversight Committee receives Epstein estate documents, 'birthday book'
item.description: Democrats on the committee have shared a photo they say is the page purportedly written by Donald Trump.
